page.title: 02INTRODUCING WEST KILBRIDE(2)
page.content:
{The village has three churches _ St Andrews, Overton and St Brides. The first two of these belong to the Church of Scotland and the third to the Roman Catholic Church.All are well attended each Sunday and have many associated clubs.
If you came to West Kilbride some {suitable sites for you to visit}would be Law Castle or the Glen ( where there are tennis courts,a putting green,a running track and a football field.) Another feature you might like to see would be the school as it is new. You could have a pleasurable walk up Tarbet Hill or along the beach. In the summer months you would enjoy{local events}like _ Gala Day,the Boys' Brigade Fete and the West Kilbride Flower Show _ the biggest and best in the area.
